item.description:
The O’Hartford 5K and Wee Mile o’fficially caps off Hartford's weekend St. Patrick's festivities on March 16, 2008. Join in this moving party through downtown streets. Along the way, Irish bagpipers and Celtic fiddlers will entertain. The fun continues after your finish on the doorstep of Max Downtown, where Max's chefs will reward you with corned beef, Murphy's Irish Stout and much more.

Just before the 5K, The Wee Mile offers a 1-mile course for the wee ones and short distance walkers.

COSTUMES ENCOURAGED! Prizes awarded to the most uniquely dressed participants.
item.name: O’Hartford 5K
